info.name: Real Estate Backend - Complete API Collection
info.description: Complete API collection for all roles in the Real Estate Management System

item.name: Tenant
item.description: APIs for tenant role - payments and maintenance requests

body.raw:
{
  "property": "Apartment 4B, 123 Main St",
  "title": "Leaky Faucet",
  "description": "The kitchen faucet has been dripping for 3 days",
  "priority": "medium",
  "tenant": "Current Tenant"
}

item.name: Commercial
item.description: APIs for commercial role - listings, visits, and requests

item.name: Technician
item.description: APIs for technician role - inventories, quotes, and progress tracking

item.name: Accounting
item.description: APIs for accounting role - payments, expenses, collections, and financial management

item.name: Admin
item.description: APIs for admin role - document management, utilities, debt collection, reminders, and leases

response.name: Success

item.name: Sales Manager
item.description: APIs for sales manager role - overview, properties, clients, and alerts

body.raw:
{
  "type": "Payment Overdue",
  "urgency": "urgent",
  "title": "John Doe - Payment Overdue",
  "message": "Rent overdue by 5 days",
  "property": "123 Main St, Apt 4B",
  "tenant": "John Doe",
  "amount": 1500.00
}

response.name: Success

item.name: Landlord
item.description: APIs for landlord role - properties, payments, work orders, claims, and inventory

body.raw:
{
  "date": "2024-01-15",
  "landlord": "Jane Smith",
  "property": "456 Oak Ave",
  "tenant": "John Doe",
  "amount": 1200.00,
  "period": "January 2024",
  "description": "Monthly rent payment"
}

response.name: Success

item.name: Super Admin
item.description: APIs for super admin role - system-wide management, companies, users, properties, and system settings

body.raw:
{
  "name": "ABC Real Estate",
  "email": "contact@abcrealestate.com",
  "phone": "+1-555-0123",
  "address": "123 Business St",
  "licenseNumber": "RE123456",
  "description": "Full-service real estate company"
}

response.name: Success
